"Complete a certain Client Order.":
"Your objective in this training is to refill
the Energy Pods by collecting Energy
Crystals.
The Energy Pods are being targeted by
the enemy. If the Pods take damage,
they will lose energy.
Protect the Pods while you refill them.
――――――――――――――――――――
Objective: Clear an E-Trial
Failure: Life points reach 0"
